itunes:title: 270 - 7 Effective Social Media Strategies That Will Surprise You
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
Be honest, there is some dark twisted part of you that wishes you were Instagram Famous.

Quit trying to you hide it, you’re sick. You’re an egomaniac. I mean, you’d have to be to wish you were super successful on social media… right?

OR is there a way to succeed on social media that’s actually the opposite of selfish?

Do you have deep resources for social media success, hiding dormant in you, right under the surface?

In this episode I want to share a few major mindset shifts and a few strategic tactics that will help you level up your social media game and start making consistent progress from here on out.

If your social media approach up to now has been a pendulum swing from desperate sprints that leave you feeling gross and burnout, to the inevitable long breaks away from social media to recover, THIS EPISODE IS FOR YOU!

------------------

This episode is Part 3 of our 3 Part CREATIVE PEPamorphosis Series! We are taking 3 weeks to do a REMOTE RETREAT, using social distancing as a metaphorical cocoon for creative development!

Share Your Inspiration on instagram by using hashtag #cptremoteretreat
